verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that walks <WH1980> not in the counsel <WH6098> of the ungodly <WH7563>, nor stands <WH5975> in the way <WH1870> of sinners <WH2400>, nor sits <WH3427> in the seat <WH4186> of the scornful <WH3887>.
But his delight <WH2656> is in the law <WH8451> of the Lord <WH3068>; and in his law <WH8451> does he meditate <WH1897> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>.

And he shall be like a tree <WH6086> planted <WH8362> by the rivers <WH6388> of water <WH4325>, that brings forth <WH5414> his fruit <WH6529> in his season <WH6256>; his leaf <WH5929> also shall not wither <WH5034>; and whatever he does <WH6213> shall prosper <WH6743>.
The ungodly <WH7563> are not so <WH4671>: but are like the chaff which the wind <WH7307> drives away <WH5086>.
Therefore the ungodly <WH7563> shall not stand <WH6965> in the judgment <WH4941>, nor sinners <WH2400> in the congregation <WH5712> of the righteous <WH6662>.
For the Lord <WH3068> knows <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the righteous <WH6662>: but the way <WH1870> of the ungodly <WH7563> shall perish <WH6>.
